DataSource.Query: SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY quotations.quotation_id) AS "Order No", quotations.quotation_id as "Pick Id", customers.customer_name, quotations.expected_delivery_date as "delivery date", quotation_details.quantity, ' ' as "EnterPrice", units.unit_name, items.item_name, quotations.terms FROM sales.quotations JOIN inventory.customers ON quotations.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN sales.quotation_details ON quotations.quotation_id = quotation_details.quotation_id JOIN inventory.items ON quotation_details.item_id = items.item_id JOIN inventory.units ON quotation_details.unit_id = units.unit_id WHERE quotations.office_id = @OfficeId and quotations.cancelled = false AND quotations.expected_delivery_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date
